summary: ItemizedIconOverlay.addItem(int, Item) does not call populate()

comments.content:
I noticed that addItem(int, Item) does not call populate(). I believe that if you use this method, then your items will never get added to the mInternalItemList and will never appear.

Can anyone confirm?

This issue was updated by revision r1257.

Added populate() call to addItem(int, Item)
